attributes.action: Make distribution of junk mail a criminal offence.
attributes.additional_details: Benefits of this proposal include both an enhanced quality of life for all UK householders suffering harassment at the hands of junk mail distributors and a reduction in waste material resulting in environmental savings.
attributes.background:
I, like many other UK householders, feel constantly harassed by the large volume of junk mail being posted to me on a daily basis. 

Please support this petition to ban the distribution of unaddressed and unsolicited mail and make this form of nuisance a criminal offence.
